name: py-anyio

variants.name: build_system

description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.

dependencies.name: py-exceptiongroup
dependencies.description:
A backport of the BaseExceptionGroup and ExceptionGroup classes from
Python 3.11.

dependencies.name: py-idna
dependencies.description: Internationalized Domain Names for Python (IDNA 2008 and UTS #46)

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-sniffio
dependencies.description:
This is a tiny package whose only purpose is to let you detect which
async library your code is running under.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-starlette
dependent_to.description: The little ASGI library that shines.

dependent_to.name: py-httpcore
dependent_to.description:
The HTTP Core package provides a minimal low-level HTTP client, which
does one thing only. Sending HTTP requests.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Core Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server
dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.

dependent_to.name: py-watchfiles
dependent_to.description:
Simple, modern and high performance file watching and code reload in
python.
